{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = HP |model = RSVLD |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = -0707 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = 1150-7931 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = (non-standard connector) |formfactor = module
|vendor_id = 0ace |device_id = 1215 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = B94RSVLD0707 |icid = 466F-RSVLD0707 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Atheros;AR2524;AR2524-AQ1C, D362Y.1J, 0728, TAIWAN; |chip2 = Atheros;AR2124;AR2124-AL1C, CR1615.01D, 0739, TAIWAN; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = none |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Lite-On |manuf_model = WN4300A |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/25/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :'''HP''' P/N {{HP PN|1150-7931}}
"WN4300A V03", "TXDIVE", "323C160673B7", and "Pluto Rev 3" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The module pin definition is in the FCC manual. {{see also|Lite-On WN4300A}} Additional specifications, per the FCC manual / datasheet.. :This adapter probably isn't supported by standard zd1211rw Linux kernel driver :(lacks support for AR2124 RFIC chip), however may be supported by this [[ZyDAS]] :Linux driver: [https://wikidevi.com/files/ZyDAS/ZD1211_USB/Linux/LinuxUSB_AR2524-3.0.0.56.tgz LinuxUSB_AR2524-3.0.0.56.tgz]
*[https://alexkaltsas.wordpress.com/2014/07/22/hacking-a-printerss-wifi-module/ Hacking a Printer's Wi-Fi Module] :Notes the USB ID as the default ZD1211B ID, 0ace:1215 :Notes 3.3V supply voltage
===Specifications=== {{802dot11 RxSens|11b |1M=-91 |2M=-87 |5.5M=-87 |11M=-84 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11g |6M=-85 |9M=-85 |12M=-84 |18M=-83 |24M=-80 |36M=-76 |48M=-71 |54M=-70 }}
